verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַ֚ו <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽישַׁלְּחוּ֙ <WH7971> that they put out מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> of the camp כָּל־ <WH3605> every צָר֖וּעַ <WH6879> every leper וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone זָ֑ב <WH2100> and every one that hath an issue וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and everyone טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> and whosoever is defiled לָנָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> by the dead

מִזָּכָ֤ר <WH2145> Both male עַד־ <WH5704> against נְקֵבָה֙ <WH5347> and female תְּשַׁלֵּ֔חוּ <WH7971> shall ye put out אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> the camp תְּשַׁלְּח֑וּם <WH7971> shall ye put וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> they will not יְטַמְּאוּ֙ <WH2930> them that they defile אֶת־ <WH853> מַ֣חֲנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4264> not their camps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whereof אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I שֹׁכֵ֥ן <WH7931> I dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> in the midst

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did so כֵן֙ <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיְשַׁלְּח֣וּ <WH7971> and put them out אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> thus עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> so did בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> When a man אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> or woman כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יַעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> shall commit מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all manner חַטֹּ֣את <WH2403> any sin הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> that men לִמְעֹ֥ל <WH4603> commit מַ֖עַל <WH4604> to do a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְאָֽשְׁמָ֖ה <WH816> be guilty הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and that person הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וְהִתְוַדּ֗וּ <WH3034> Then they shall confess אֶֽת־ <WH853> חַטָּאתָם֮ <WH2403> their sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשׂוּ֒ <WH6213> which they have done וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> and he shall recompense אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <WH817> his trespass בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> with the principal וַחֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <WH2549> unto it the fifth יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> thereof and add עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> of וְנָתַ֕ן <WH5414> [part] thereof and give לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> whom אָשַׁ֥ם <WH816> [it] unto [him] against whom he hath trespassed לֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֵ֨ין <WH369> has לָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> But if the man גֹּאֵ֗ל <WH1350> have no kinsman לְהָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> to recompense הָאָשָׁם֙ <WH817> the trespass אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> for הָאָשָׁ֛ם <WH817> unto let the trespass הַמּוּשָׁ֥ב <WH7725> be recompensed לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> [even] to the priest מִלְּבַ֗ד <WH905> alone אֵ֚יל <WH352> beside the ram הַכִּפֻּרִ֔ים <WH3725> of the atonement אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְכַפֶּר־ <WH3722> whereby an atonement shall be made בּ֖וֹ עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> Also

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every תְּרוּמָ֞ה <WH8641> And every offering לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all קָדְשֵׁ֧י <WH6944> of all the holy things בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> which they bring לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> unto the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And every man's אֶת־ <WH853> קֳדָשָׁ֖יו <WH6944> hallowed things ל֣וֹ יִהְי֑וּ <WH1961> becomes אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> shall be his whatsoever any man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> shall be his whatever יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> becomes פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> unto them If any אִישׁ֙ <WH376> man's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תִשְׂטֶ֣ה <WH7847> go aside אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> wife וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <WH4603> and commit ב֖וֹ מָֽעַל׃ <WH4604> a trespass

וְשָׁכַ֨ב <WH7901> lie אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And a man אֹתָהּ֮ <WH854> for שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> seed זֶרַע֒ <WH2233> child וְנֶעְלַם֙ <WH5956> and it be hid מֵעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> from the eyes אִישָׁ֔הּ <WH376> of her husband וְנִסְתְּרָ֖ה <WH5641> and be kept close וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> herself נִטְמָ֑אָה <WH2930> and she be defiled וְעֵד֙ <WH5707> and [there be] no witness אֵ֣ין <WH369> and there בָּ֔הּ וְהִ֖וא <WH1931> herself לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not נִתְפָּֽשָׂה׃ <WH8610> against her neither she be taken

וְעָבַ֨ר <WH5674> come עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> over רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> And the spirit קִנְאָ֛ה <WH7068> of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֥א <WH7065> upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> of his wife וְהִ֣וא <WH1931> she נִטְמָ֑אָה <WH2930> and she be defiled אוֹ־ <WH176> or עָבַ֨ר <WH5674> come עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> over רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> or if the spirit קִנְאָה֙ <WH7068> of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֣א <WH7065> upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> of his wife וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <WH2930> and she be not defiled

וְהֵבִ֨יא <WH935> bring הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Then shall the man אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּוֹ֮ <WH802> his wife אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <WH3548> unto the priest וְהֵבִ֤יא <WH935> and he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנָהּ֙ <WH7133> her offering עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> for עֲשִׂירִ֥ת <WH6224> for her the tenth הָאֵיפָ֖ה <WH374> [part] of an ephah קֶ֣מַח <WH7058> meal שְׂעֹרִ֑ים <WH8184> of barley לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִצֹ֨ק <WH3332> he shall pour עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and שֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> no oil וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> upon it nor put עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and לְבֹנָ֔ה <WH3828> frankincense כִּֽי־ <WH3588> grain מִנְחַ֤ת <WH4503> thereon for it [is] an offering קְנָאֹת֙ <WH7068> of jealousy ה֔וּא <WH1931> he מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> an offering זִכָּר֖וֹן <WH2146> of memorial מַזְכֶּ֥רֶת <WH2142> to remembrance עָוֹֽן׃ <WH5771> iniquity
וְהִקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> shall bring her near אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> And the priest וְהֶֽעֱמִדָ֖הּ <WH5975> and set לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> her before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וְלָקַ֧ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <WH6918> holy בִּכְלִי־ <WH3627> vessel חָ֑רֶשׂ <WH2789> in an earthen וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הֶֽעָפָ֗ר <WH6083> and of the dust אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> is on בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <WH7172> that is in the floor הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and put אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> [it] into the water

וְהֶעֱמִ֨יד <WH5975> shall set הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁה֮ <WH802> the woman לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD וּפָרַע֙ <WH6544> and uncover אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> head הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> the woman's וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּפֶּ֗יהָ <WH3709> in her hands אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִנְחַ֣ת <WH4503> the offering הַזִּכָּר֔וֹן <WH2146> of memorial מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> offering קְנָאֹ֖ת <WH7068> which [is] the jealousy הִ֑וא <WH1931> which וּבְיַ֤ד <WH3027> shall have in his hand הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> and the priest יִהְי֔וּ <WH1961> become מֵ֥י <WH4325> water הַמָּרִ֖ים <WH4751> the bitter הַמְאָֽרֲרִֽים׃ <WH779> that causeth the curse

וְהִשְׁבִּ֨יעַ <WH7650> shall charge her by an oath אֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest וְאָמַ֤ר <WH559> and say אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> unto the woman אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֨א <WH3808> no שָׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> have lain אִישׁ֙ <WH376> If no man אֹתָ֔ךְ <WH854> for וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֥א <WH3808> no שָׂטִ֛ית <WH7847> with thee and if thou hast not gone aside טֻמְאָ֖ה <WH2932> to uncleanness תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under אִישֵׁ֑ךְ <WH376> [with another] instead of thy husband הִנָּקִ֕י <WH5352> be thou free מִמֵּ֛י <WH4325> water הַמָּרִ֥ים <WH4751> from this bitter הַֽמְאָרֲרִ֖ים <WH779> that causeth the curse הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> to this

וְאַ֗תְּ <WH859> you כִּ֥י <WH3588> if שָׂטִ֛ית <WH7847> But if thou hast gone aside תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under אִישֵׁ֖ךְ <WH376> [to another] instead of thy husband וְכִ֣י <WH3588> and if נִטְמֵ֑את <WH2930> and if thou be defiled וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> have אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and some man בָּךְ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁכָבְתּ֔וֹ <WH7903> lain מִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֖י <WH1107> with thee beside אִישֵֽׁךְ׃ <WH376> thine husband

וְהִשְׁבִּ֨יעַ <WH7650> shall charge הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> Then the priest אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָֽאִשָּׁה֮ <WH802> the woman בִּשְׁבֻעַ֣ת <WH7621> with an oath הָאָלָה֒ <WH423> of cursing וְאָמַ֤ר <WH559> shall say הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> and the priest לָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> unto the woman יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> make יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אוֹתָ֛ךְ <WH853> לְאָלָ֥ה <WH423> thee a curse וְלִשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <WH7621> and an oath בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among עַמֵּ֑ךְ <WH5971> thy people בְּתֵ֨ת <WH5414> doth make יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְרֵכֵךְ֙ <WH3409> thy thigh נֹפֶ֔לֶת <WH5307> to rot וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּטְנֵ֖ךְ <WH990> and thy belly צָבָֽה׃ <WH6638> fight swell

וּ֠בָאוּ <WH935> shall go הַמַּ֨יִם <WH4325> And this water הַמְאָרְרִ֤ים <WH779> that causeth the curse הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> and this בְּֽמֵעַ֔יִךְ <WH4578> into thy bowels לַצְבּ֥וֹת <WH6638> to swell בֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> to make [thy] belly וְלַנְפִּ֣ל <WH5307> to rot יָרֵ֑ךְ <WH3409> and [thy] thigh וְאָמְרָ֥ה <WH559> shall say הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> And the woman אָמֵ֥ן ׀ <WH543> Amen אָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> amen

וְ֠כָתַב <WH3789> shall write אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָלֹ֥ת <WH423> these curses הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest בַּסֵּ֑פֶר <WH5612> in a book וּמָחָ֖ה <WH4229> and he shall blot אֶל־ <WH413> into מֵ֥י <WH4325> water הַמָּרִֽים׃ <WH4751> [them] out with the bitter

וְהִשְׁקָה֙ <WH8248> to drink אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> And he shall cause the woman אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֥י <WH4325> water הַמָּרִ֖ים <WH4751> the bitter הַמְאָֽרֲרִ֑ים <WH779> that causeth the curse וּבָ֥אוּ <WH935> shall enter בָ֛הּ הַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> and the water הַֽמְאָרֲרִ֖ים <WH779> that causeth the curse לְמָרִֽים׃ <WH4751> into her [and become] bitter
